p: The methanol extracts were obtained from 5 g plant powder (aerial parts previously extracted with dichloromethane in Soxhlet) and 50 mL methanol 70%, for 30 min at 60 Â°C (CHME). The tincture (1:10) was obtained from 50 g of herbal material and 500 mL 70% ethanol by maceration at room temperature for 7 days (CHT) [ 79].
